verses.verse: The words <S%H1697><s%> of Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hilkiah <S%H2518><s%>, of the priests <S%H3548><s%> that were in Anathoth <S%H6068><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>:

To whom the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Josiah <S%H2977><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amon <S%H526><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, in the thirteenth <S%H7969><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of his reign <S%H4427><s%>.

It came also in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Jehoiakim <S%H3079><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josiah <S%H2977><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, unto the end <S%H8552><s%> of the eleventh <S%H6249><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josiah <S%H2977><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, unto the carrying away <S%H1540><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> captive <S%H1540><s%> in the fifth <S%H2549><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>.
Then the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Before <S%H2962><s%> I formed <S%H3335><s%> you in the belly <S%H990><s%> I knew <S%H3045><s%> you <S%H3318><s%>; and before you came forth out of the womb <S%H7358><s%> I sanctified <S%H6942><s%> you <S%H5414><s%>, and I ordained you a prophet <S%H5030><s%> unto the nations <S%H1471><s%>.
Then said <S%H559><s%> I <S%H162><s%>, Ah, Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>! behold <S%H3045><s%>, I cannot speak <S%H1696><s%>: for I am a child <S%H5288><s%>.

But the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H559><s%>, Say not <S%H5288><s%>, I am a child: for you shall go <S%H3212><s%> to all that I shall send <S%H7971><s%> you <S%H6680><s%>, and whatever I command you you shall speak <S%H1696><s%>.
Be not afraid <S%H3372><s%> of their faces <S%H6440><s%>: for I am with you to deliver <S%H5337><s%> you <S%H5002><s%>, says the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> put forth <S%H7971><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%>, and touched <S%H5060><s%> my mouth <S%H6310><s%>. And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H5414><s%>, Behold, I have put my words <S%H1697><s%> in your mouth <S%H6310><s%>.

See <S%H7200><s%>, I have this day <S%H3117><s%> set <S%H6485><s%> you over the nations <S%H1471><s%> and over the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%>, to root out <S%H5428><s%>, and to pull down <S%H5422><s%>, and to destroy <S%H6><s%>, and to throw down <S%H2040><s%>, to build <S%H1129><s%>, and to plant <S%H5193><s%>.

Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying, Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, what see <S%H7200><s%> you <S%H559><s%>? And I said, I see <S%H7200><s%> a rod <S%H4731><s%> of a almond tree <S%H8247><s%>.
Then said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> unto me <S%H3190><s%>, You have well seen <S%H7200><s%>: for I will hasten <S%H8245><s%> my word <S%H1697><s%> to perform it <S%H6213><s%>.

And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came unto me the second time <S%H8145><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, What see <S%H7200><s%> you <S%H559><s%>? And I said, I see <S%H7200><s%> a seething <S%H5301><s%> pot <S%H5518><s%>; and the face <S%H6440><s%> there is toward <S%H6440><s%> the north <S%H6828><s%>.

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H6828><s%>, Out of the north a evil <S%H7451><s%> shall break forth <S%H6605><s%> upon all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>.

For <S%H7121><s%>, behold, I will call all the families <S%H4940><s%> of the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; and they shall come <S%H935><s%>, and they shall set <S%H5414><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> at the entering <S%H6607><s%> of the gates <S%H8179><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, and against all the walls <S%H2346><s%> there round about <S%H5439><s%>, and against all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>.

And I will utter <S%H1696><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%> against them touching <S%H5921><s%> all their wickedness <S%H7451><s%>, who have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> me <S%H6999><s%>, and have burned incense unto other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, and worshiped <S%H7812><s%> the works <S%H4639><s%> of their own hands <S%H3027><s%>.

You therefore clothe up <S%H247><s%> your body <S%H4975><s%>, and arise <S%H6965><s%>, and speak <S%H1696><s%> unto them all that I command <S%H6680><s%> you <S%H2865><s%>: be not dismayed at their faces <S%H6440><s%>, lest I confound <S%H2865><s%> you before them <S%H6440><s%>.

For <S%H589><s%>, behold, I have made <S%H5414><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%> a fortified <S%H4013><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>, and a iron <S%H1270><s%> pillar <S%H5982><s%>, and bronze <S%H5178><s%> walls <S%H2346><s%> against the whole land <S%H776><s%>, against the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, against the princes <S%H8269><s%> there <S%H3548><s%>, against the priests there <S%H5971><s%>, and against the people of the land <S%H776><s%>.
And they shall fight <S%H3898><s%> against you <S%H3201><s%>; but they shall not prevail against you <S%H5002><s%>; for I am with you, says the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, to deliver you <S%H5337><s%>.
